title: Requires a recording officer not to record or accept a transfer or assignment of interest in a mortgage unless accompanied with a mortgage ownership assignment
summary: Requires a recording officer not to record or accept a transfer or assignment of interest in a mortgage unless accompanied with a mortgage ownership assignment document.

       Introduced  by  Sen. PERALTA -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the recording of a
         transfer or assignment of a mortgage interest

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.   The real property law is amended by adding a new section
    2  291-i to read as follows:
    3    S 291-I. RECORDING OF TRANSFERS AND ASSIGNMENTS OF MORTGAGES; MORTGAGE
    4  OWNERSHIP ASSIGNMENT DOCUMENT. 1. A RECORDING OFFICER SHALL  NOT  RECORD
    5  OR ACCEPT FOR RECORDING ANY MORTGAGE OR ASSIGNMENT OF MORTGAGE MADE TO A
    6  NON-NATURAL  PERSON AFFECTING LAND IN THIS STATE UNLESS ACCOMPANIED BY A
    7  MORTGAGE OWNERSHIP ASSIGNMENT DOCUMENT IN  A  FORM  PRESCRIBED  BY  THIS
    8  SECTION  AND THE FEE PRESCRIBED PURSUANT TO SECTION EIGHT THOUSAND TWEN-
    9  TY-ONE OF THE CIVIL PRACTICE LAW AND RULES. SUCH FORM SHALL BE  RECORDED
   10  NO  LATER THAN NINETY DAYS AFTER THE DATE OF THE ACKNOWLEDGMENT OR PROOF
   11  OF SUCH INSTRUMENT.
   12    2. THE FORM OF THE MORTGAGE OWNERSHIP ASSIGNMENT DOCUMENT SHALL BE  AS
   13  FOLLOWS:

   14                   MORTGAGE OWNERSHIP ASSIGNMENT DOCUMENT

   15  NAME OF MORTGAGEE OR ASSIGNEE:

   16  ________________________________________________________________________

   17  ADDRESS:

   18  ________________________________________________________________________

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03130-01-1

       S. 667                              2

    1  PHONE NUMBER:

    2  ________________________________________________________________________

    3  DATE THAT MORTGAGE OR ASSIGNMENT WAS ACKNOWLEDGED OR PROVED:

    4  ________________________________________________________________________

    5  AUTHORIZED REPRESENTATIVE OF MORTGAGEE OR ASSIGNEE:

    6  ________________________________________________________________________

    7    3.  FAILURE  TO  RECORD A MORTGAGE OR ASSIGNMENT OF MORTGAGE MADE TO A
    8  NON-NATURAL PERSON AFFECTING LAND IN THIS STATE BY THE DATE SPECIFIED IN
    9  SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS SECTION, SHALL SUBJECT THE MORTGAGEE OR ASSIGNEE
   10  WHO FAILS TO COMPLY WITH THIS SECTION TO A CIVIL PENALTY OF TWO  HUNDRED
   11  FIFTY  DOLLARS.    THE PENALTY SHALL BE ASSESSED BY, AND PAYABLE TO, THE
   12  RECORDING OFFICER.   PENALTIES COLLECTED PURSUANT  TO  THIS  SUBDIVISION
   13  SHALL BE USED TO SUPPORT RECORDING OFFICER OPERATIONS.
   14    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
   15  have become a law and shall apply to all  mortgages  or  assignments  of
   16  mortgages executed on or after such date.
